attributes.action: lose The Game and announce it to the nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Game is an ongoing mind game currently played by millions of people throughout the UK. A large number of British citizens believe that they will win The Game when the Prime Minister announces that he has lost The Game publicly to the nation. This petition aims to provide the long-needed method for those people to make their voices heard.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
